scripts.build:lib: rimraf dist && bun build --outdir dist --target node --external break-check --external glob --external npmlog --external simple-git -- src/break-check.ts
scripts.build:bin: rimraf bin && bun build --outdir bin --target node --external break-check --external glob --external npmlog --external simple-git -- src/break-check.x.ts
scripts.schema: bun src/break-check.x.ts --testPattern --testCommand --certifyCommand -- schema && mv break-check.schema.json dist
scripts.lint: bun run lint:biome && bun run lint:eslint && bun run lint:types
